name: Apple CarPlay Preview WWDC 2022
description:
Like many of you, my eyes were glued to the screen during the WWDC keynote presentation.


One totally new interface that Apple showed during the keynote was the new car UI that they're working on.


It will be an extension of CarPlay and Apple is working with many car manufacturers to implement this in their cars by the end of 2023.


Since it was so new, I thought it'd be a good idea to create it in Figma and post it here for any one else who might want to play around with it and create their own variations of it,
